name: FNaF 4 Retro Edition
summary: This is a complete recreation of FNaF 4 in an 8-bit art style!

name: FNaF: Project Lockdown
summary: Dock to a space station with deadly animatronics and try to get out alive.

name: FNaF 2: Wii U Edition
summary: Your new job: survive five nights at the new Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. Thought you'd be safe behind two flimsy doors? Think again. No doors, no security—just a Freddy mask to protect you. And hiding behind the monitor won't help; they're smarter than you think.

name: FNaF World Simulator
summary:
Welcome back to Animatronica!

Freddy has completed "the game", and gained an unfair amount of power. With his new powers, he'll take over Animatronica and destroy any enemies left in it.

It is now up to the so called "enemies" to stop Freddy before it's too late!

name: FNF: Spooky Mix
summary:
IT'S SPOOKY MONTH!
Play as the spookiest kids around town, Skid and Pump, in spoOoOoOoOky remixes of ALL 26 songs from base game! Every level has been given a spooky fresh coat of paint in the spirit of Halloween.

name: FNaF World
summary:
Featuring the entire cast from the Five Nights at Freddy's series, this fantasy RPG will let players control their favorite animatronics in an epic animated adventure!

With 40 playable characters, multiple endings, multiple difficulties, and a great soundtrack from artist Leon Riskin, FNaF World hits the ground running and doesn't stop. Take control of Freddy and the gang as they set out on a quest in the world beneath worlds, a world that reflects the actions and deeds of the "flipside", where things have started becoming distorted and broken. Lead your team deeper into this digital world to find the source of these glitches and monsters, and restore it to what it was designed to be- a safe haven.

But be careful, behind the curtain there may be something even more sinister pulling the strings...

name: FNaF Multiplayer: Forgotten Pizzeria
summary: A free-to-play multiplayer game where the action takes place at night, in the insanely big, randomly generated Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. Players are randomly placed in one of the two available roles: nightguards and animatronics. Guards rush to find tools to complete maintenance work while the animatronics hunt them down with their special abilities.

name: FNAFMIN
summary: This mod is a recreation of Five Nights at Freddy's built into the Pikmin 2 engine using the Pikmin 2 Decomp.

name: FNaF World
summary: After the release of FNaF World on PCs, Scott Cawthon learned that he has been rushing his game releases and that he forced lore into a silly, cute RPG game. When the Android Port released, people quickly realized that this Mobile Port is edited to be more silly and goofy, with the game poking jokes at itself at times.

name: FNaF World Randomizer
summary:
This is a mod for FNAF WORLD where enemy encounters, bosses, party members, attack moves, chip chests, and byte shops are all randomized.

You have the option of either playing Adventure Mode- beginning with a team of 8 and going through the game as you would- or Fixed Party, which is having every move and party member from the start.

name: FNaF World: Halloween Edition
summary: One of Scott Cawthon's infamous "troll games", a brief RPG which was notably released before the actual FNaF World. It is a FNaF themed reskin of Scott's 2014 game Fighter Mage Bard.

name: FNaF World: Refreshed
summary: FNaF World: Refreshed is a revamp/overhaul of the original game. The goal of the game is to give the player more FNaF World, because who doesn't love FNaF World?

name: FNAF Online Multiplayer
summary: An online multiplayer fangame of Five Nights at Freddy’s 1 where 3-5 players each occupy their own office and must collaborate via in-game voice chat to survive the night. One player can also assume the role of the Purple Guy, controlling animatronics to eliminate the others before 6AM. Currently in alpha, available for Windows via GameJolt and Itch.

name: FNaF: Wii U Edition
summary: FNaF: Wii U Edition is a remake of Five Nights at Freddy's for Wii U made by Source Macchiato. You have been recruited as a night guard at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza restaurant and must monitor animatronics while avoiding getting killed. Select the camera on your gamepad and watch on your TV screen if anything strange happened. This remake includes translation into French, Spanish, Italian, German and Arabic languages and different layouts.

name: FNAF 1 Remake
summary:
FNaF 1 Remake is a bite-sized FNaF Experience based on a lot of popular media surrounding the game in the current day.

This game was made for 2025's April Fools

name: FNaF World Refreshed
summary: FNaF World: Refreshed Is a revamp/overhaul of the original game. The goal of the game is to give the player more FNaF World, because who doesn't love FNaF World?

name: FNF vs. Yung Lixo: Full WeeK
FNF Weekly
summary: A new FNF mod every single week? You must be tweaking, boss!

name: FNF: Executable Mania
summary: FNF: EXEcutable Mania was a Friday Night Funkin' creepypasta mod created by danii. The mod planned to star several EXEs and internet horrors in a grab bag fashion. It has 7 songs on its demo, with more planned on its full release.

name: FNF: V.S. Tabi Ex Boyfriend
summary: Your girlfriend, invited by her dad's friend for some unknown reason, asks you to come along with her. When you arrive at the place, there was no one, except for one weird guy that scared your girlfriend out. Will everything go well or is something bad going to happend

name: FNF Big Chungus Mod Piano Tiles
FNaC Fur
summary: This is the game. put down your silly horror games and join Candy and his twin sister Cindy on this brand new adventure - a spiritual successor to "Candy's Adventure", a popular minigame from the hit horror experience "Five Nights at Candy's 3"!

name: FNAF in Psych Engine
summary: FNAF 1, but remade in Friday Night Funkin' Psych Engine LUA

name: FNaF Free Edition
summary: Fan made playable version of "Five Nights at Freddy's Ransomware"

name: FNaF Ultimate Edition
summary:
‎Take the coolest parts from the Five Nights at Freddy's series, put them together and boom- you've got FNaF Ultimate Edition!
With its own story (differentiating from the original series' plot) and some unique game mechanics (on top of the originals you're familiar with), this game is worth giving a try if you're looking for something in the style of Classic FNaF!

name: FNaF World: Outplay
summary: FNaF World: Outplay is a Five Nights at Freddy's fan game about to recreate the FNaF World from an RPG format to a Sonic-like platformer format with fast-paced gameplay.

name: FNAF: Final Purgatory
summary: Survive until 6 AM if you can...

name: FNaF World: Update 2
summary: Update 2, also known as Update 1.20, is a free expansion update and sequel of the main story for FNaF World, adding 8 new animatronics, 2 new areas, 4 minigames, 6 new hard-hitting enemies, and 9 new special attacks.

name: FNF x Ace Attorney: Turnabout
summary:
OBJECTION!!
Phoenix Wright fights in court using the power of funk, against Miles Edgeworth, in the pursuit of a Not Guilty Verdict!
